info.title: Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-access-point-cmd-rpc - RPC Operations
info.description:
Copyright (c) 2019-2024 by Cisco Systems, Inc.
     All rights reserved.

**Module:** `Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-access-point-cmd-rpc`
**Version:** 2025-03-01
**Operations:** 51

post.summary: AP Image Predownload for all
post.description:
AP Image Predownload for all

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:set-rad-predownload-all`

post.summary: AP conversion from CAPWAP to Meraki mode
post.description:
AP conversion from CAPWAP to Meraki mode

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:convert-ap-to-meraki`

post.summary: Write existing tags config to the AP
post.description:
Write existing tags config to the AP

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:set-ap-tags`

post.summary: Instruct the AP to reset the CAPWAP session
post.description:
Instruct the AP to reset the CAPWAP session

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:set-rad-capwap-reset`

post.summary: AP reset
post.description:
AP reset

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:ap-reset`

post.summary: Run the AP image upgrade algorithm in dry-run mode
post.description:
Run the AP image upgrade algorithm in dry-run mode

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:ap-image-upgrade-dry-run`

post.summary: AP Image Predownload abort
post.description:
AP Image Predownload abort

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:ap-image-predownload-abort`

post.summary: Add a new site to site filters for AP Upgrade
post.description:
Add a new site to site filters for AP Upgrade

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:image-site-filter-add`

post.summary: Remove a site from AP upgrade site filters
post.description:
Remove a site from AP upgrade site filters

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:image-site-filter-remove`

post.summary: Clear the site filters and apply selected operation on all remaining sites. If no operation has been performed, only existing site filters are deleted.
post.description:
Clear the site filters and apply selected operation on all remaining sites. If no operation has been performed, only existing site filters are deleted.

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:image-site-filter-clear`

post.summary: Apply the selected upgrade operation on all newly added sites
post.description:
Apply the selected upgrade operation on all newly added sites

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:image-site-filter-apply`

post.summary: Remove all sites from AP upgrade site filters. This will only work for N+1 upgrade/move
post.description:
Remove all sites from AP upgrade site filters. This will only work for N+1 upgrade/move

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:image-site-filter-remove-all`

post.summary: Move APs to a destination controller using rolling AP upgrade
post.description:
Move APs to a destination controller using rolling AP upgrade

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:ap-move-destination`

post.summary: Start N+1 AP image upgrade to destination controller. Instruct all the APs to swap their image and join the given controller after reboot
post.description:
Start N+1 AP image upgrade to destination controller. Instruct all the APs to swap their image and join the given controller after reboot

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:ap-upgrade-destination`

post.summary: Clear local configuration of Office Extended AP
post.description:
Clear local configuration of Office Extended AP

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:clear-ap-personal-ssid`

post.summary: Set AP reset button state
post.description:
Set AP reset button state

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:set-ap-reset-button`

post.summary: Set AP TFTP downgrade
post.description:
Set AP TFTP downgrade

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:set-ap-tftp-downgrade`

post.summary: Configure static IP address for AP
post.description:
Configure static IP address for AP

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:set-ap-static-ip-enable`

post.summary: Set static IP domain name
post.description:
Set static IP domain name

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:rad-static-ip-domain-set`

post.summary: Set static ip Name Server
post.description:
Set static ip Name Server

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:set-ap-static-ip-namesrvr`

post.summary: Starts the transfer of AP and radio crash data file from AP to controller
post.description:
Starts the transfer of AP and radio crash data file from AP to controller

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:get-rad-crash-data-file`

post.summary: Initiate Office Extended AP link test
post.description:
Initiate Office Extended AP link test

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:network-diagnostics`

post.summary: Unset Cisco AP static IP address configuration
post.description:
Unset Cisco AP static IP address configuration

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:set-ap-static-ip-disable`

post.summary: Instruct the AP to start image predownload
post.description:
Instruct the AP to start image predownload

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:set-ap-predownload`

post.summary: Instruct the AP to swap the image
post.description:
Instruct the AP to swap the image

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:swap-ap-image`

post.summary: Clear all AP upgrade reports from controller. If only one report needs to be deleted, the name can be specified.
post.description:
Clear all AP upgrade reports from controller. If only one report needs to be deleted, the name can be specified.

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:clear-ap-upgrade-report-name`

post.summary: Clear AP config
post.description:
Clear AP config

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:clear-ap-config`

post.summary: Send AP spectral recording event
post.description:
Send AP spectral recording event

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:ap-spectral-recording`

post.summary: AP USB data
post.description:
AP USB data

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:set-ap-usb`

post.summary: Set AP USB override
post.description:
Set AP USB override

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:set-ap-usb-override`

post.summary: Clear the AP predownload statistics
post.description:
Clear the AP predownload statistics

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:clear-ap-predownload-statistics`

post.summary: Clear AP Meraki conversion statistics
post.description:
Clear AP Meraki conversion statistics

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:clear-ap-meraki-stats`

post.summary: Revalidate tags for all APs
post.description:
Revalidate tags for all APs

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:ap-tag-reval`

post.summary: Start RF based AP neighborhood load-balancing algorithm
post.description:
Start RF based AP neighborhood load-balancing algorithm

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:ap-nbr-loadbalance-start`

post.summary: Apply RF based AP neighborhood load-balancing algorithm. It will re-balance the APs across WNCD instances
post.description:
Apply RF based AP neighborhood load-balancing algorithm. It will re-balance the APs across WNCD instances

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:ap-nbr-loadbalance-apply`

post.summary: Clear RF based AP neighborhood load-balancing algorithm data
post.description:
Clear RF based AP neighborhood load-balancing algorithm data

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:ap-nbr-loadbalance-clear`

post.summary: Set AP role
post.description:
Set AP role

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:set-role-ap`

post.summary: Set AP keepalive state
post.description:
Set AP keepalive state

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:set-ap-keepalive-state`

post.summary: Configure Open RRM Tx Power Parameters for AP Radio
post.description:
Configure Open RRM Tx Power Parameters for AP Radio

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:set-open-rrm-tx-power-auto`

post.summary: Configure Open RRM Channel Parameters for AP Radio
post.description:
Configure Open RRM Channel Parameters for AP Radio

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:set-open-rrm-channel-auto`

post.summary: Abort the current AP upgrade algorithm
post.description:
Abort the current AP upgrade algorithm

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:ap-image-upgrade-abort`

post.summary: Renew AP LSC with given due days expiry
post.description:
Renew AP LSC with given due days expiry

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:all-ap-lsc-renew`

post.summary: Renew AP LSC
post.description:
Renew AP LSC

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:per-ap-lsc-renew`

post.summary: Set AP height
post.description:
Set AP height

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:set-lrad-geolocation-height`

post.summary: Clear AP height
post.description:
Clear AP height

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:clear-lrad-geolocation-height`

post.summary: Set AP GNSS parameters
post.description:
Set AP GNSS parameters

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:set-lrad-geolocation-gnss`

post.summary: Set AP GNSS raw data interval
post.description:
Set AP GNSS raw data interval

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:set-gnss-interval`

post.summary: Sampling interval for sensor data collection, per site or all APs
post.description:
Sampling interval for sensor data collection, per site or all APs

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:ap-sensor-interval`

post.summary: Move an AP to a different access controller
post.description:
Move an AP to a different access controller

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:ap-move`

post.summary: Update AP's geolocation for more accurate location
post.description:
Update AP's geolocation for more accurate location

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:ap-location-update`

post.summary: AP support bundle request
post.description:
AP support bundle request

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_access_point_cmd_rpc:ap-support-bundle`
